name: Today'squestion
0:
”Alexa open Today's Question”
”Alexa, what is my ranking in Today's Question”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: today's question
des:
Open Today’s question to assess your level of general knowledge every day and have fun while learning!
Answer correctly and you will accumulate points to become the month’s top scorer!
And don’t hesitate too long, as you will get more points if you answer faster!

The ranking is reset every month, giving you many opportunities to restart the battle and become number one.

And if you are smart enough to provide 5 correct answers in a row, you will activate the super bonus and get even more points!

Have fun with Today’s Question!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
